SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pay_overdue po JOIN customer c ON c.id = po.cum_id JOIN contract con ON con.id = po.contract_id
AND po.status = #{status}
AND c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{criteria.keyword}, '%')
AND con.contract_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{criteria.keyword}, '%')
AND po.pay_overdue_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{criteria.keyword}, '%')

SELECT po.id AS overdueId, po.pay_overdue_code AS payOverdueCode, c.name AS customerName, c.in_charge AS inCharge, c.call_num AS callNum, con.contract_code AS contractCode, con.monthly_payment AS monthlyPayment, po.due_date AS dueDate, po.overdue_period AS overduePeriod, po.status AS status, po.paid_date AS paidDate FROM pay_overdue po JOIN customer c ON c.id = po.cum_id JOIN contract con ON con.id = po.contract_id WHERE po.id = #{overdueId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM item_overdue io JOIN customer c ON c.id = io.cum_id JOIN contract con ON con.id = io.contract_id
AND io.status = #{status}
AND c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{criteria.keyword}, '%')
AND con.contract_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{criteria.keyword}, '%')
AND io.item_overdue_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{criteria.keyword}, '%')

SELECT io.id AS overdueId, io.item_overdue_code AS itemOverdueCode, c.name AS customerName, c.in_charge AS inCharge, c.call_num AS callNum, io.contract_id AS contractId, con.contract_code AS contractCode, io.count AS count, io.due_date AS dueDate, io.overdue_period AS overduePeriod, io.status AS status FROM item_overdue io JOIN customer c ON c.id = io.cum_id JOIN contract con ON con.id = io.contract_id WHERE io.id = #{overdueId}
SELECT i.item_code AS itemCode, i.name AS itemName, i.status AS itemStatus FROM contract_with_item ci JOIN item i ON i.id = ci.item_id WHERE ci.contract_id = #{contractId}
SELECT i.item_code AS itemCode, i.name AS itemName, i.status AS itemStatus FROM contract_with_item cwi JOIN item i ON i.id = cwi.item_id WHERE cwi.contract_id = #{contractId}

SELECT c.id AS contractId, c.cum_id AS customerId, DATE_ADD(c.start_date, INTERVAL c.contract_period MONTH) AS dueDate, COUNT(cwi.item_id) AS itemCount, DATEDIFF( CURDATE(), DATE_ADD(c.start_date, INTERVAL c.contract_period MONTH) ) AS overduePeriod FROM contract c JOIN contract_with_item cwi ON c.id = cwi.contract_id WHERE c.status = 'C'
AND DATE_ADD(c.start_date, INTERVAL c.contract_period MONTH) < NOW() AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM item_overdue io WHERE io.contract_id = c.id AND io.status = 'P' ) GROUP BY c.id, c.cum_id;
